charmgo

  • json-server

    • GET POST PUT DELETE
      • config 请求配置
      • data 响应结果
      • headers 请求头
      • request 创建的XMLHttpRequest实例对象
      • status 响应的状态码
      • statusText 响应的文本字符串
    • 配置对象: request config
    • 实例：

# json-server

npm install -g json-server

json-server --watch db.json

# axios

# GET POST PUT DELETE

axios({
	method: '',
	url: '',
	data:{}
}).then(response=>{
	//代码块
}).catch(error=>{
	//代码块
})

# 响应

# config 请求配置

# data 响应结果

# headers 请求头

# request 创建的XMLHttpRequest实例对象

# status 响应的状态码

# statusText 响应的文本字符串

# 配置对象: request config

略

$\color{red}{默认配置:}$

axios.defaults.method = 'GET'; axios.defaults.baseURL = 'http://localhost:3000'; axios.defaults.timeout = 300;


$\color{red}{创建实例对象:}$

const ts = axios.create({
	baseURL: '',
   timeout: 2000
});
//ts与axios对象的功能几乎一致


const ts = axios.create({
			baseURL: 'http://localhost:3000',
			timeout: 2000
		});
		
		ts({
			method: 'GET',
			url: '/test'
		}).then(response=>{
			console.log(response.data);
		})

$\color{red}{拦截器:}$

  • 请求拦截器
axios.interceptors.request.use(function(config){
	console.log('请求截器 成功');
   return config;
},function(error){
	console.log('求拦截器失败');
   return Promise.reject(error);
})
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8
  • 响应拦截器
axios.interceptors.response.use(function(response){
	console.log('响应拦截器成功');
   return response.data;
},function(error){
	console.log(‘响应拦截器失败’);
   return Promise.reject(error);
})
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8

$\color{red}{取消请求:}$

$\color{blue}{重点：}$ cancelToken参数

const btns = document.querySelectorAll('button');

var cancel = null;

btns[0].onclick = function() {
	if (cancel === null) {
		axios({
			method: 'GET',
			url: 'http://localhost:3000/posts',
			cancelToken: new axios.CancelToken(function(c) {
				cancel = c;
			})
		}).then(response => {
			console.log(response.data)
			cancel = null;
		})
	}else{
		alert('正在请求');
		}
}

btns[4].onclick = function() {
	cancel();
	cancel = null;
};

# 实例：

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<title>axios</title>
		<script src="./js/axios.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
		<script src="js/vue.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
	</head>
	<style type="text/css">
		#app {
			width: 100%;
			height: 100%;
		}

		ul li {
			width: 200px;
			height: 50px;
			list-style: none;
			float: left;
		}

		button {
			width: 150px;
			height: 30px;
			color: aliceblue;
			border: #F0F8FF;
			border-radius: 0.625rem;
		}

		button:hover {
			box-shadow: 0 8px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 6px 11px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.19);
		}

		button:active {
			transform: translateY(4px);
		}
	</style>
	<body>
		<h1>基本使用</h1>
		<hr>
		<div id="app">
			<ul>
				<li><button type="button" style="background-color: blue;">发送GET请求</button></li>
				<li><button type="button" style="background-color: darkorange;">发送POST请求</button></li>
				<li><button type="button" style="background-color: green;">发送PUT请求</button></li>
				<li><button type="button" style="background-color: red;">发送DELETE请求</button></li>
				<li><button type="button" style="background-color: black;">取消请求</button></li>
			</ul>
		</div>
	</body>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		// http://localhost:3000/posts
		// http://localhost:3000/comments
		// http://localhost:3000/albums
		// http://localhost:3000/photos
		// http://localhost:3000/users
		// http://localhost:3000/todos

		const btns = document.querySelectorAll('button');

		var cancel = null;

		btns[0].onclick = function() {
			if (cancel === null) {
				axios({
					method: 'GET',
					url: 'http://localhost:3000/posts',
					cancelToken: new axios.CancelToken(function(c) {
						cancel = c;
					})
				}).then(response => {
					console.log(response.data)
					cancel = null;
				})
			}else{
				alert('正在请求');
			}
		}

		btns[4].onclick = function() {
			cancel();
			cancel = null;
		};

		btns[1].onclick = function() {
			axios({
				method: 'POST',
				url: 'http://localhost:3000/test',
				data: {
					email: '2113733946@qq.com',
					name: '李四',
					body: '今天下大雨'
				}
			}).then(response => {
				console.log(response)
			})
		}

		btns[2].onclick = function() {
			axios({
				method: 'PUT',
				url: 'http://localhost:3000/test/2',
				data: {
					email: 'xdy@qq.com',
					name: '张三',
					body: '今天有人成仙'
				}
			}).then(response => {
				console.log(response.data);
			})
		}

		btns[3].onclick = function() {
			axios({
				method: 'DELETE',
				url: 'http://localhost:3000/test/1',
			}).then(response => {
				console.log(response.data)
			})
		}


		// const ts = axios.create({
		// 	baseURL: 'http://localhost:3000',
		// 	timeout: 2000
		// });

		// ts({
		// 	method: 'GET',
		// 	url: '/test'
		// }).then(response=>{
		// 	console.log(response.data);
		// })
	</script>
</html>
